observation: Financial Advisor in San Antonio & Corpus Christi, Texas  Skip to content CLIENT LOGIN LISTEN WATCH Envelope Phone-alt Facebook-f Twitter Icon-linkedin About Us About Our Team Our Story Investment Philosophy Disclosures Services Who We Serve Personal Investment Management Strategic Planning & Investment Management for Endowments & Foundations Company-Sponsored Retirement Plans Clients Becoming a Client Investment Reporting Management Fees Client Login Resources Our Blog Useful Guides TV Money Wise TV Show Podcast Money Wise Podcast Contact Corpus Christi San Antonio Menu Invest with confidence. purpose. us. We are a financial advisor specializing in investment management and retirement planning for individuals, businesses and endowments with offices in San Antonio and Corpus Christi, Texas Corpus Christi | San Antonio GET STARTED We sit on the same side of the table as our clients. As a fiduciary, fee-only, Registered Investment Adviser We do not outsource asset management to other investment advisors, all investment decisions are made in-house by our portfolio management team. Whether you are an individual, family, corporation, endowment, or another type of organization, we provide skilled and transparent investment management. Above all, we put our clients’ interests first and foremost. WHO WE SERVE OUR FEES FINANCIAL ADVISOR CORPUS CHRISTI 5350 South Staples, Suite 434 361.906.0070 FINANCIAL ADVISOR SAN ANTONIO 8000 I-10 West, Suite 970 210.418.1989 SPEAK WITH AN ADVISOR Jeff Davidson Kyle Davidson Joe C. Rust Jr. Dawn Davidson Jacquline Theis Davidson Capital Seventy Plus Years of Investment Management Experience. Davidson Capital Management, Inc. is a family owned and operated, Securities and Exchange Commission Registered Investment Advisor established in 1989, We provide comprehensive investment management services for individual investors, families, foundations, endowments, pensions and profit-sharing 401(k)s. We are financial advisors in San Antonio and Corpus Christi, Texas. MEET OUR TEAM OUR PHILOSOPHY OUR STORY MONEY WISE with your hosts If you are tired of financial talk show infomercials and are interested in a weekly recap of the happenings on Wall Street from an experienced portfolio management team tune into Money Wise. LISTEN TO PAST SHOWS LISTEN TO MONEY WISE LIVE Every Saturday 12 PM – 2 PM Listen on Your Favorite Podcast Provider Apple Google Pandora Spotify Radio Public iHeart Radio If you have investment related questions or show topics, email the “Money Wise Guys” SUBMIT YOUR QUESTION Listen to the latest episodes of Money Wise April 13, 2024 March 30, 2024 THERE'S NO TIME LIKE THE PRESENT It's never too late to get started or get a second opinion We offer a second opinion of your current investment portfolio, call to learn more about your investment management needs, and our firm to see if our services are right for you. SCHEDULE A CALL 1.800.275.2162 Email Us CORPUS CHRISTI SAN ANTONIO Money Wise A weekly discussion of Wall Street and investing including timely investment management topics.
